mapper.select: SELECT sku.* FROM eb_group_buy_activity_sku sku inner JOIN eb_product product ON sku.product_id = product.id inner join eb_product_attr_value pav on sku.sku_id = pav.id WHERE sku.group_activity_id = #{groupActivityId} AND product.is_del = 0 AND (product.audit_status = 2 OR product.audit_status = 0) -- 审核成功 和 免审商品 AND pav.is_show = 1 ORDER BY sku.active_price ASC , sku.id ASC limit 1
